page.title: 05THE VICAR OF FOXTON
page.content: Rev.David King is the vicar of the parish which includes Foxton Gartree and Gumley. He came to St. Andrew's Church in November 1983.The most important part of his work he says is visiting the people to make friends and help in any way he can.He also writes lots of letters during his day. He preaches at each village church on Sunday. St. Andrew's_8a.m.,10a.m.,and 6p.m. St. Helen's_1130a.m.,4.45p.m. There is also a chapel in Gartree prison for the inmates and staff.The vicar is Rev.Pratt. Both vicars dislike the fact that only a few of the parishoners regularly attend the services.
